titleStmt.title: An elegy on the much lamented death of Mr. Samuel Loveday who departed this life on the 15th of Decemb. 1677. in the 59th year of his age.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "O heavy stroke! Oh bitter lamentation! ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
